__e: Ah,forget it, what's done, is done.
You think it's easy for me knowing you're so nearby?
I MEAN, UH, NO, IT WA-- IT WAS PLEASURABLE FOR ME, TOO, UM-- VERY PLEASURABLE,
Even though I know that, I really want you.
You did it for me... because you knew I couldn't.
- That's what I said, but... I knew it wasn't true even when I said it.
I mean I didn't think it would be so hard to see her when I know...
I MEAN, UH, NO, IT WA-- IT WAS PLEASURABLE FOR ME, TOO, UM-- VERY PLEASURABLE,
But knowing not what will happen, am I not wise to be afraid?
Not knowing how to talk about it, or not having the words.
You can't remember it, so they can't get it out of you.
Or perhaps to please you, knowing what you do when you find them.
But surely the clearest proof of it is that, knowing what I know, that I have sent for you and not for the police.
Wakin' up on the ranch in the morning, knowin' what I'm supposed to do that day. Knowing I'm home.
He's afraid that seeing him here, and knowing what happened to the Enterprise, will make him timid.
Wakin' up on the ranch in the morning, knowin' what I'm supposed to do that day. Knowing I'm home.
But surely the clearest proof of it is that, knowing what I know, that I have sent for you and not for the police.
Fight death all your days... then die, knowing you know nothing.
Can you understand that you can be in love, know that it's wrong and not be able to do anything about it?
Leave your car with us and enjoy your trip safely knowing that it will be waiting when you come back.
I don't know as I'd have consented if I'd knowed it was so young.
Didn't say no though he knew he should have.
I went to call the cops, but I knew she´d be dead before they got there. And I´d be free.
Considering she's been staying with me. Not very much. No.
There's nothing better I'd like than to go away with her thinking well of me.
